AT0027.title: Card Vending Platforms
AT0027.description: Card vending platforms typically refer to illegal or gray-area online platforms that provide illegal account credentials, login credentials, credit card information, bank card information, or other financial account information for purchase and misuse. These platforms may operate on the dark web or other hidden network environments, attracting individuals or organizations seeking to obtain others' financial information for fraud or illegal transactions.

references.title: Behind the Scaling of Gray/Black Markets: The Resource Trading Network Composed of Card Vending Platforms
